root.name: Kikuni Masahiko no Jantoushi Dora Ou 2
root.description: OverviewLike its prequel, it deals with mahjong as a sort of component for the "battle" system, only that the first game focuses on two players, and this second game focus more with four players. Kikuni Masahiko no Jantoushi Dora Ou 2 is also a bit more "free", allowing you to explore the world map.

similar_games.game: Kikuni Masahiko no Jantoushi Dora Ou
